programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two hard-partying brothers (Zac Efron, Adam Devine) bring two wild and uncontrollable women to their sister's (Sugar Lyn Beard) wedding in Hawaii.

programme.title: Margaret, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Feeling responsible for a fatal traffic accident, a high-school student lashes out when her attempts to make amends meet with opposition.

programme.title: Invictus, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the fall of apartheid, Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman) tries to unite his countrymen by supporting the South African rugby team's underdog bid for the 1995 World Cup Championship.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Table 19, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man (Wyatt Russell), an ex-maid of honor (Anna Kendrick) must sit with a group of strangers (Craig Robinson, Lisa Kudrow) during her friend's wedding reception.

programme.title: The Sitter, (2011, Comedy)
programme.desc: The world's worst baby sitter (Jonah Hill) takes a brood of rambunctious children (Max Records, Landry Bender, Kevin Hernandez) on a wild night-time odyssey through New York.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victim's daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Exception, (2016, History)
programme.desc: During World War II, a soldier (Jai Courtney) travels to a secluded mansion to investigate a mysterious German monarch. He soon finds himself entangled in a web of deceit while having a dangerous love affair with a local Jewish woman (Lily James).

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Role Models, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: The Boss, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: After her release from prison, a former CEO (Melissa McCarthy) battles old enemies while trying to build a brownie empire with her ex-assistant (Kristen Bell).

programme.title: The Disaster Artist, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: The incredible true story of aspiring filmmaker and Hollywood outsider Tommy Wiseau as he and his best friend defiantly pursue their dreams and embark on the hilarious odyssey of making the now-infamous, cult classic "The Room.".

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son (Jaeden Lieberher) and the boozy misanthrope (Bill Murray) who lives next door.

programme.title: State of Play, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: An investigative journalist (Russell Crowe) stumbles into a cover-up of gigantic proportions as he and his partner probe the murder of a beloved congressman's (Ben Affleck) mistress.

programme.title: Big Miracle, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgrd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: Logan, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: In the near future, a weary Logan (Hugh Jackman) cares for an ailing Professor X (Patrick Stewart) while protecting a young mutant girl (Dafne Keen) from the dark forces that want to capture her.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: Lady Bird, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple (Zach Galifianakis, Isla Fisher) discover it's not easy keeping up with their gorgeous and ultra-sophisticated new neighbors, the Joneses, especially when they discover that Mr. and Mrs. Jones are really covert operatives.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: Low Tide, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenager Alan and his younger brother find a bag of gold coins in a dead man's island home, they try to hide it from their friends -- but one of them, suspicious and violently unpredictable, is willing to do anything to get the money.

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: The Assistant, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Digital assistants are programmed to help people. However, when one such bot goes rogue, it ends up becoming a nightmare for its owner, who is stepping into new beginnings.

programme.title: Denial, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Writer David Irving (Timothy Spall) wages a legal battle against historian Deborah Lipstadt (Rachel Weisz) after she accuses him of denying the Holocaust.

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke, (2016, Animated)
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: Problemista, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alejandro, an aspiring toy designer from El Salvador, tries to bring his fanciful ideas to life and chase his dream in New York City with the help of his erratic employer.

programme.title: The Secrets We Keep, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: In post-World War II America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

programme.title: Anthropoid, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons, (2022, Animated)
programme.desc: On his birthday, Jonathan Kent learns his dad is Superman and that he has superpowers of his own. He also meets Damian Wayne. The two boys are forced to team up to protect their loved ones from a hostile alien force.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A girl turning 16 likes another girl's guy (Michael Schoeffling) and feels nobody cares about her birthday.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A girl turning 16 likes another girl's guy (Michael Schoeffling) and feels nobody cares about her birthday.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: The Sitter, (2011, Comedy)
programme.desc: The world's worst baby sitter (Jonah Hill) takes a brood of rambunctious children (Max Records, Landry Bender, Kevin Hernandez) on a wild night-time odyssey through New York.

programme.title: Four Christmases, (2008, Christmas)
programme.desc: When their plans for a holiday getaway fall apart, a couple (Vince Vaughn, Reese Witherspoon) must spend Christmas Day trudging to a quartet of family get-togethers.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Tell, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A small-time thief (Milo Ventimiglia) makes a big score and tries to keep it from his ex-partner, his ex-wife and other greedy sorts.

programme.title: The Kill Team, (2019, War)
programme.desc: When a young U.S. soldier in Afghanistan witnesses other recruits killing civilians under the direction of a sadistic sergeant, he begins to fear that the men he's serving with might be the ones to kill him.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A vengeful sheriff and two bounty hunters track a murderous family (Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon Zombie) on the run.

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: When their mother descends into madness, siblings Gretel and Hansel must fend for themselves in the dark and unforgiving woods. Stumbling upon an isolated home, the children soon suspect that the generous but mysterious owner has sinister intentions.

programme.title: Soul Plane, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Passengers and crew (Kevin Hart, Method Man) enjoy a wild party aboard an airliner flying from Los Angeles to New York.

programme.title: Ambush, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: When a small outpost gets ambushed during the Vietnam War, a U.S. Army squad takes the battle below ground for a high-stakes mission unlike anything they've ever seen.

programme.title: Legally Blondes, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: British twin sisters (Milly Rosso, Becky Rosso) experience culture shock when they attend school in California.

programme.title: Suspect Zero, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: With help from his former partner (Carrie-Anne Moss), an FBI agent (Aaron Eckhart) searches for a man (Ben Kingsley) who is hunting and murdering serial killers.

programme.title: Atlantic City, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A boardwalk numbers runner (Burt Lancaster) feels young again with a casino clam shucker (Susan Sarandon) and a lucky cocaine deal.

programme.title: The General's Daughter, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two investigators (John Travolta, Madeleine Stowe) find an underworld of sex and cover-ups behind an Army captain's murder.

programme.title: The Krays, (1990, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Warped by their mother (Billie Whitelaw), cockney twins Ronald and Reginald Kray (Gary Kemp, Martin Kemp) become gangsters in 1950s London.

programme.title: Blink Twice, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Daredevil operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) springs into action when four dangerous criminals steal Pandora's Box, a device that controls every military satellite in the world.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: A troubled Gulf War veteran (Denzel Washington) becomes suspicious after a powerful senator's (Meryl Streep) son (Liev Schreiber) becomes a candidate for vice president.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman suspected of murdering her lover with an ice pick ensnares a San Francisco cop in a web of lust and deceit.

programme.title: The Madness of King George, (1994, History)
programme.desc: The 18th-century British monarch (Nigel Hawthorne) loves his devoted queen (Helen Mirren) but illness dramatically affects his mind.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After serving three tours of duty on the front lines of Afghanistan and Iraq for the U.S. Army, Raul Sanchez seeks the comfort of comedy to help with his post-traumatic stress disorder; his act highlights the lighter side of everyday life and war.

programme.title: 1984, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Orwell's Big Brother is watching as Winston Smith (John Hurt) and his lover (Suzanna Hamilton) defy authority in bleak Oceania.

programme.title: 1984, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Orwell's Big Brother is watching as Winston Smith (John Hurt) and his lover (Suzanna Hamilton) defy authority in bleak Oceania.

programme.title: Runaway Train, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Jon Voight, Eric Roberts) and a stowaway girl (Rebecca De Mornay) ride an unmanned diesel speeding out of control through Alaska.

programme.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: A 1930s movie star (Jeff Daniels) steps off the screen to join a waitress (Mia Farrow) in the audience.

programme.title: Child's Play, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Two teachers (James Mason, Robert Preston) breed violence at a boys boarding school, with a gym teacher (Beau Bridges) in the middle.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Considered a suspect in a deadly arson, a police chief must cover his tracks while trying to prove his innocence.

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service, (1969, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (George Lazenby) proposes to a contessa (Diana Rigg) and foils SPECTRE chief Blofeld's (Telly Savalas) agricultural plot.

programme.title: The Living Daylights, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond (Timothy Dalton) takes a Czech cellist (Maryam d'Abo) to her boyfriend, a KGB defector (Jeroen Krabb) doing business in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Die Another Day, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: James Bond (Pierce Brosnan) teams with a beautiful agent (Halle Berry) to battle a terrorist and a businessman (Toby Stephens) bent on world domination.

programme.title: Dr. No, (1962, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: Live and Let Die, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) charms a tarot reader (Jane Seymour) in Jamaica on the voodoo/heroin trail of Mr. Big (Yaphet Kotto).

programme.title: Spectre, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: As James Bond (Daniel Craig) ventures toward the heart of the sinister organization SPECTRE, he discovers a chilling connection between himself and the enemy (Christoph Waltz) he seeks.

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Eye of the Needle, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Nazi spy (Donald Sutherland) seduces the wife (Kate Nelligan) of a crippled pilot (Christopher Cazenove) on the Scottish coast before D-Day.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romance)
programme.desc: A New York comedian (Woody Allen) recalls his lost love, a kooky singer (Diane Keaton) with a style all her own.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romance)
programme.desc: A New York comedian (Woody Allen) recalls his lost love, a kooky singer (Diane Keaton) with a style all her own.

programme.title: This is Christmas, (2022, Christmas)
programme.desc: Following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

programme.title: Snack Shack, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Best friends AJ and Moose seize the opportunity to run the local pool's rundown snack shack. However, things take an unexpected turn when they meet Brooke, an effortlessly cool lifeguard who puts their big summer plans -- and friendship -- at risk.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a hardened convict who engineered an elaborate plan to bust out of the famed prison in 1962.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers, (2006, War)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Into the Wild, (2007, Drama)

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 39 - A Conspirao de Morgana Aracnin Morgana e os Mini-Karasutengus Kei(Himenin Emiha) e Manabu

programme.title: Uma desconhecida ninja do imprio procura Tetsuzan Yamashi e encontrar sua localizao de Pako. Jiraya ento ajuda a nisei a encontrar o local nas minas.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 40 - A Traio Tetsunin Steel 002 Tha(Jiraiya), Kazenin Storm, Rainin Wild e Hnin Jane

programme.title: Uchnin Dell-Star tem um sonho e percebe que nunca combater Jiraya sem sua antiga espada, Sat, porque ela a nica que pode derrotar a espada Olmpica. O caador de espadas tambm est a sua procura. O que acontecer?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 41 - Olmpica VS Sat Uchnin Del-Star e Igynin Beni Lagarto(controlado pela magia da Espada Sat) Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.title: o aniversrio da morte da me dos Yamashi e Marabu fica sentido por no guardar nenhuma lembrana, porm ela aparece misteriosamente depois de 8 anos. Ser que a me deles no morreu? Ser que pode ser mais um plano da famlia dos feiticeiros?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 42 - Adeus, Mame Segundo Sainin Gyma Famlia Yamashi e Akiko

programme.title: Strowver, um antigo desafiante Tetsuzan reaparece para vingar a perda de seu brao arrancado pelo nisei. Toha fica cego pela fora do ninja tirano e as foras malignas se unem para destruir Jiraya enquanto est fragilizado.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 43 - O Indomvel Strover Shakunin Strover Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.title: O Homem Mssil pede ajuda de Jiraya para proteger Tao, uma menina criada como filha do heri depois da Guerra no Vietn, mas eles so surpreendidos pela famlia de feiticeiros que sequestra a menina e levam a foguete do Homem Mssil .
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 44 - O Poder do Amor Famlia de Feiticeiros Bakunin Homem-Mssil

programme.title: Morgana e Dokosai planejam um atentado para acabar com Jiraya e finalmente destruir o Deus Jirai. Para isso eles sequestram Kasumi e a usam para conseguirem o que querem. Oruha se v obrigada a obedecer as foras do mal para salvar a irm.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 45 - A Ponte da Esperana Chefe da Famlia Kaminin Tha(Jiraiya), Kaminin Oruha e Kazumi

programme.title: Uchnin Dell-Star se une a famlia dos feiticeiros para torturar destruir Jiraya. Ele utiliza de um ninja aposentado para espalhar o boato de que Pako est com os Yamashi e coloca a populao contra eles.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 46 - Amizade Perdida Uchnin Del-Star Tha(Jiraiya) e Henri Rakuchin

programme.title: Manabu conhece uma menina filha do professor Takai que acredita que o Senhor do Mal se esconde na mina e apenas ele pode decifrar a escritura. A famlia de feiticeiros consegue a confiana do professor para encontrar o Deus Jirai e destru-lo
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 47 - Manabu e seu Primeiro Amor Aracnin Morgana e Seinin Allan(enfeitiado por Morgana, e posteriormente salvo por Manabu) Manabu e Akari

programme.title: O planeta Me das Trevas se aproxima da Terra e Uchnin Dell-Star finalmente quer a sua vingana. O centro terremoto na mina em que esconde o Deus Jirai, ento a famlia Yamashi vai at l para saber o que aconteceu e encontra Pako.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 48 - O Aparecimento de Pako Uchnin Del-Star , Kenin Parchis, Suinin Tubaro Mor e Yaminin Devilcat Famlia Yamashi

programme.title: Para exterminar Pako, o planeta das trevas se aproxima da Terra pouco a pouco e, nesse exato momento na mina, inicia-se uma magnfica batalha entre jiraya e seu velho inimigo Dell-Star.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 49 - O ltimo Confronto Famlia de Feiticeiros, Uchnin Del-Star e as almas de 10 ninjas mortos por Jiraiya Famlia Yamashi e Jnin Baro Owl

programme.title: Dokosai e Jiraya travam uma batalha inesquecvel contra as foras dos feiticeiros e o bem.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: O grande profeta Edin previu a apario do maligno deus das trevas Satan Goss. Edin convocou Jaspion para defender o Universo e derrotar Satan Goss.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Daileon faz um pouso forado no planeta Peace. L, Jaspion conhece o satlite artificial Sakura que controla o planeta e seus habitantes bestiais.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion se depara com o monstro Namaguederaz, um monstro pacfico que foi atingido por uma flecha venenosa. O menino Koko, que convive com o monstro, revela que s a fruta da vida pode salv-lo.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Edin acha que a Terra, por ter sido antigamente habitada por vrios monstros, seria um alvo em potencial de Satan Goss.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A jovem Satomi, em sua escola, teve vises de um monstro. Por causa disso, ela se assusta e chama a ateno da aula toda.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Crianas de uma vila local encontram um filhote de monstro. MacGaren e sua quadrilha, disfarados, levam o monstrinho. Jaspion ajuda as crianas a recuperarem o filhote, mas MacGaren contra ataca.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Quatro jovens desaparecem misteriosamente numa trilha pelas montanhas. Anri encontra Jaspion e explica sobre os misteriosos desaparecimentos no "Monte Uivante".
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Boomerman pede ajuda para Jaspion e avisa que dois membros da quadrilha de MacGaren desertaram, e por isso so perseguidos sob pena de morte. Eles so Rod e Satie. Um casal de fugitivos que foi enganado por falsas promessas de MacGaren.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion, Anri e Miya esto na floresta. De repente escutam um canto que vem de uma rvore de cedro. Jaspion conversa com a rvore e descobre que ela ser derrubada. Macgaren sugere a seu pai Satan Goss que transforme a rvore em um monstro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A histria de uma certa rvore

programme.title: Crianas de uma vila local encontram um filhote de monstro. MacGaren e sua quadrilha, disfarados, levam o monstrinho. Jaspion ajuda as crianas a recuperarem o filhote, mas MacGaren contra ataca.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Quatro cientistas esto no caminho da cidade tecnolgica de Tsukuba em uma lancha pelo rio. Quando voltam esto com os cabelos brancos, alm disso comeam a agir violentamente.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A profecia da Bblia Galctica cita a existncia de um emprstimo passado dourado que ajudou um heri a derrotar Satan Goss. Macgaren escraviza o povo de uma aldeia em busca do pssaro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Chegando da Galxia, os renegados espaciais "Quadridemos" com um nico objetivo: destruir Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: O garoto Katsuya tira uma foto de um monstro no lago. Jaspion vai investigar o misterioso lago.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: O perigo na lagoa dos noivos

programme.title: Os rapazes viajam para Arkansas para participar de um concerto de flauta doce e Cartman tenta tocar "rudo marrom", uma nota que faz com que as pessoas caguem nas calas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Ento eles resolvem roubar dentes, j que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes ficam entusiasmados com um circo e seus contorsionistas sensacionais e acabam tendo a ideia de criar seu prprio circo. Enquanto isso, cinco meninas escapam do tal circo e Kenny est fazendo aulas de pera.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Todos os alunos de South Park so diagnosticados com TDAH (Dficit de Ateno e Hiperatividade) depois que o novo aluno, Timmy, foi diagnosticado erroneamente com a mesma coisa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Conto Southparkineiro de um livro de Dickens, tendo como narrador o britnico Malcolm McDowell, e como protagonista, Pip, um menino ingls pobre, que sonha em se transformar em um cavalheiro para conquistar a garota dos seus sonhos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vrios problemas com pedfilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associao De Ssias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: Kyle est doente e sua me est tentando curar ele atravs da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas romnticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chef est furioso pois acha que a bandeira de South Park racista e quer que a mudem. Mas por outro lado, Jimbo (apoiado pelos KKK), acha que faz parte da histria e que no deveriam mudar coisa alguma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman tem um sonho estranho em que ele, Kyle, Stan e Kenny ficam famosos em uma banda de pop juvenil chamada "Fingerbang", e entende isso como um sinal de Deus.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Uma coisa que voc pode fazer com o seu dedo

programme.title: Os rapazes querem saber se os deficientes (como Timmy) ou os judeus (como Kyle e Ike) vo para o cu, aps escutar o sermo do Padre Maxi e da irm Anne. Enquanto isso, Sadam Hussein volta ao inferno e tem um encontro esquisito com Satn.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Os deficientes vo para o inferno?

programme.title: Esta a continuao do episdio anterior "Os deficientes vo para o inferno?". Cartman e os rapazes criam a sua prpria igreja ao ver que a verdadeira igreja no pode ajud-los.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: o primeiro dia dos rapazes no quarto ano e eles no gostaram nada de sua nova professora. Ento, eles pedem ajuda aos vizinhos de Kyle para transformar a cadeira de rodas de Timmy em uma mquina do tempo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman ensina aos rapazes sueu novo fichrio ultra moderno da Trapper Keeper, e melhor que o de Kyle. Mais tarde, no nibus, um homem supostamente chamado Bill Cosby mostra um enorme interesse pelo tal fichrio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os alunos do quarto ano esto participando da pea "Hellen Keller, a milagrosa". O nico objetivo deles conseguir ir um pouco melhor que os alunos do jardim de infncia, que segundo Butters, preparam um show espetacular.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Todos acham que Cartman est muito gordo e decidem envi-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny est topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva s mais diversas insanidades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais no deixam. Cartman sugere que ele v polcia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes esto tristes pois o senhor Hanckey anda bastante ocupado com sua famlia e no consegue compartilhar seu esprito natalino pela cidade. Ento eles tem uma ideia para reviver o esprito natalino na cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Scott Tenorman um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele far o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participao especial: Radiohead.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes conhecem um novo rapaz deficiente chamado Jimmy no clube de exploradores, e Timmy fica com cimes. Por outro lado, os pais no conseguem acreditar que Gay Al seja o lder destes pequenos exploradores.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes conseguem entradas para ir assistir ao show de Terrance e Philip ao vivo, mas o programa cai no mesmo dia que o festival da "Lavagem Cerebral" pelo Dia da Terra.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Terrance e Philip: por trs do golpe

programme.title: Cartman recebe como herana de sua av um milho de dlares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diverso somente para ele, no qual ele no precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, j que ningum mais pode entrar.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um dos rapazes mais velhos ensinam para o Cartman como masturbar um cachorro. Quando os pais dos garotos descobrem isso, a escola se v obrigada a ensinar educao sexual para os estudantes em uma idade mais jovem.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Para conseguir recuperar um videogame, os rapazes devem entregar uma toalha falante e entreg-la ao servio secreto americano.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cada estudante de South Park deve doar um dlar para ajudar os meninos do Afeganisto. Mas quando Stan recebe uma caixa misteriosa por parte dos meninos afeganos, todas as agncias do governo aparecem na cidade para investigar.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Osama Bin Laden tem calas fedorentas

programme.title: No dia da foto da escola, Kenny, fazendo graa, entra no seu moletom de cabea pra baixo, deixando no lugar de sua cabea, sua bunda. Cartman acha to engraado que decide espalhar a foto nas caixas de leite da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Como comer com a sua bunda

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que tambm se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua me em South Park. Porm, apesar da mesma idade, os primos no tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Token est triste pois os demais meninos da escola tiram sarro que sua famlia rica e no tem nada a ver com South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman encontra um carregamento cheio de fetos abortados aps o tombamento de um caminho em um barranco. Em seguida, ele decide entrar para um novo negcio supostamente lucrativo: a venda de fetos mortos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: um episdio de South Park especial dedicado ao Butters para encerrar a temporada. A me de Butters descobre que seu esposo est visitando lugares gays e ento, quer se suicidar e matar o Butters.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: J que Butters parece encaixar to bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que no nada experiente, se v forado a competir contra um campeo de ski.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes fazem qualquer coisa para no perder a estreia do novo filme de Terrance e Phillip "Bundas de fogo 2".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: O trailer do novo filme de Terrance e Phillip

programme.title: A turma visita uma granja onde os meninos ficam sabendo que "vitela" uma vaquinha beb e ficam horrorizados. Eles decidem libertar estas criaturinhas e encontrar uma maneira de levar todas elas para o quarto de Stan.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Kyle e Stan dizem para Butters que ele um pouco chato e que no h chances de que ele seja o substituto de Kenny. Assim, eles resolver abrir um concurso para encontrar candidatos que possam ficar no seu lugar.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se entusiasma com umas criaturas marinhas que pode criar em seu prprio quarto. Enquanto isso, Butters, sob a forma de seu alter-ego, o Professor Caos, volta com vrios novos e malvados planos para instalar o caos em South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um caso de abusos sexuais envolvendo sacerdotes o mais novo escndalo para os habitantes de South Park. Enquanto isso, Cartman tenta descobrir que tipo de coisas so capazes de sair de sua boca.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes querem armar um clube para evitar que os diretores reestreiem seus filmes em verses "melhoradas", e Cartman acha que seria uma boa ideia oferecer chapus grtis para promover o clube.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Trfico Humano, (2015, Action)

programme.title: Segredos de um crime, (2014, Drama)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: A young couple travels to a remote lake quarry in England, only to fend off a group of teenage hoods.

programme.title: Crawl, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: As a hurricane tears through Florida, Haley rushes to find her father, who is injured and trapped in the crawl space of their home. With the storm intensifying and water levels rising, the pair face an even bigger threat lurking below the surface.

programme.title: 1BR, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: After leaving behind a painful past, Sarah scores the perfect Hollywood apartment only to discover that her surprisingly welcoming neighbors may harbor a dangerous secret.

programme.title: We Are What We Are, (2013, Thriller)

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror)

programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a young Amish woman and her son get caught up in the murder of an undercover narcotic's agent, their saviour turns out to be hardened Philadelphia detective John Book.

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Comedy)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Namis eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heavens Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!

programme.sub-title: The forbidden sacred ground! The island where god lives and heaven's judgement!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are no strangers to living on the wrong side of the law, but unpaid immigration fees and Namis assault of a White Beret earns Luffys crew a sentence of death by cloud drifting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Already criminals?! Skypiea's upholder of the law!

programme.title: Nami, Zoro, Chopper, and Robin are trapped aboard the Going Merry when its commandeered by a monstrous lobster! To rescue his crew, Luffy must venture onto the sacred grounds of Upper Yard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Is escape possible?! God's challenge is set in motion!

programme.title: Conis helps Luffy and his mates launch their rescue mission, but the rubber-man senses something amiss. When he presses her for answers, a vengeful god takes a shot at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A trap on lovely street! The almighty eneru!

programme.title: Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!

programme.sub-title: Onward, crow! To the sacrifical altar!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 10% survival rate! Satori, the mantra master!

programme.title: Usopp and Sanji try to regain control of the Crow, and Luffy stirs up a brutal barrage of bursting balls when he attacks Satori. Meanwhile, Chopper whistles for the Sky Knight to avoid becoming a sacrificial reindeer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of spheres! Desperate struggle in the lost forest!

programme.sub-title: Chopper in danger! Former god vs. Priest shura!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Profound mystery! Ordeal of string and ordeal of love?!

programme.title: The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light the fire of shandora! Wyper, the warrior!

programme.title: While the Shandorians continue their battle for control of Upper Yard, the Straw Hats celebrate their happy reunion by swapping stories over a campfire and feasting on barbequed Skyshark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jaya, city of gold in the sky! Head for god's shrine!

programme.title: Lakis pursuit of precious Vearth causes one of her Shandorian comrades to be injured during the battle with Ohm. As night falls on Upper Yard, the Straw Hats dream of gold while dancing with wolves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Festival on the night before gold-hunting! Feelings for vearth!

programme.title: The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter god eneru!! Farewell to the survivors!

programme.title: The Straw Hats scatter when their search for gold uncovers a giant python, and Gan Fall reveals the tragic story of Jayas arrival in the sky. Meanwhile, Wyper readies the Shandorians for a raid on Enerus shrine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A giant snake bares its fangs! The survival game begins!

programme.title: As the heartless god of Upper Yard eagerly anticipates the dawning of Sky Warefare, the Shandorian forces are savagely snared by the Ordeal of String, and Luffy wanders into the fight of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The deadly reject! War demon wyper's resolve!

programme.title: Zoro rushes to perfect a deadly technique known as the Flying Blade Attack. The move proves difficult to master, but it could be the key to the swordsman surviving a battle with the Shandorian warrior, Braham.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fierce midair battle! Pirate zoro vs. Warrior braham!

programme.title: Sanji and Usopp are driven to their knees by the electrifying presence of god, Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wypers Burn Bazooka, and Nami joins Gan Fall in a fight against two killer clones!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The roaring burn bazooka! Luffy vs. War demon wyper!

programme.title: Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swap cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard. Can the little reindeer discover his opponents lone weakness before its too late?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of the swamp! Chopper vs. Sky punk gedatsu!

programme.title: Nami and the Knight of the Sky team up to obliterate two bumbling, balloon-shaped bad guys, and God Eneru relies on his astounding invincibility to torment a noble Shandorian warrior.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unbeatable powers! Eneru's true form is revealed!

programme.title: Robins search for a mystical city of gold is interrupted by Yama, one of Enerus faithful servants. When the rampaging warrior destroys some ancient ruins, he provokes the wrath of Robins many fists of fury!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mystical city! The grand ruins of shandora!

programme.title: Priest Ohm silences Chopper with an attack from which few if any ever recover. Meanwhile, Luffy begins to notice something strange about his cave-like prison, and four fearsome warriors prepare for battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 0% survival rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the sword wielding priest!

programme.title: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper, Ohm, and a prizefighting pooch gather for a ferocious free-for-all at the site of the Upper Ruins. While the battle rages, Luffy tries to punch his way out of the belly of a poisonous python!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climb giant jack! Deadly combat in the upper ruins!

programme.title: Zoro and Wyper are out to beat down the same bad guys, but will they realize it soon enough to survive a white-barbed death match of doom? Deep in the belly of the python, Nami and Luffy enjoy what could be a short-lived reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of iron! White barbed death match!

programme.title: Eager to end their battle, Zoro aims the awesome destructive power of his 108 Caliber Phoenix at the sinister Priest Ohm! Elsewhere, god demands that Robin help him search for a legendary golden bell.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: God Eneru begins a deadly rampage aimed at exterminating the heavenly beings of Skypiea, and the ruins of Shandora become the scene of a bloody contest where survival is the name of the game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Collapsing upper ruins! The quintet for the finale!

programme.title: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro, and Robin join forces for an attack on God Eneru. Despite their furious onslaught, the four warriors prove powerless to harm the thunderous deity until Wyper utilizes the power of a mystical stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the ancient ruins! Sky god eneru's goal!

programme.title: God Eneru makes a shocking recovery from wounds that should have ended his reign of terror. Zoro and Wyper muster the strength for one final stand, and Nami must choose between her friends and survival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ambition toward the endless vearth! The ark maxim!

programme.title: Luffy emerges from his serpentine tomb with one thing on his mind: revenge! As the rubber-man sets out to settle the score with God Eneru, Conis rushes to warn her people of their impending doom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: They finally clash! Pirate luffy vs. God eneru!

programme.title: As the citizens of the sky run for their lives, Eneru issues in the dawn of Deathpiea! Luffy is determined to stop the madman, but first he must discover a way to lay hands on the heinous holy man!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A handful of gold sends Luffy hurtling towards his death, Sanji and Usopp mount a midair rescue mission, and Nami prepares for an electrifying showdown with God Eneru!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy falls! Eneru's judgement and nami's wish!

programme.title: Usopp arrives just in time to save Nami from a lethal thunderbolt, but even their combined powers are no match for Eneru. While they scramble for an escape route, Sanji stealthily searches for a way to sabotage gods ark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The two awaken! On the front lines of the burning love rescue!

programme.title: Despite being slowed by an arm encased in gold, Luffy races up a giant beanstalk on a mission to settle the score with Eneru! Elsewhere, the people of Skypiea feel the jolt of gods wrath!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capriccio for despair! The impending doom of sky island!

programme.title: A flashback offers a glimpse at the lives of two legendary figures in Skypieas history: Montblanc Noland and the ferocious warrior Kalgara!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Led by a bell's sound! Tale of the great warrior and the explorer!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: The Shooting, (1966, Action)
programme.desc: Starring Jack Nicholson ("Chinatown"), a cocky young cowboy sets out to track an experienced ex-bounty hunter who now has a price on his head.

programme.title: An Eye For An Eye, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter teams up with a younger one, to track down and kill the wanted gang leader who murdered his wife and little boy.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: Trapped, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: The Jennings fight for their daughter's life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.

programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.

programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.desc: Minako receives a surprise visit from Katarina, Minakos former partner. A tragic incident forced them to go their separate ways.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms when the Cardian Leshy attacks. The Sailor Guardians are caught.
